name: Blue Therapy
description:
After a series of misfortunes and failed therapy sessions, an unfortunate psych ward patient decides it’s time to settle the matter with their traumas once and for all, by finding the perfect therapist…. And maybe a potential life partner.

----------------------------------------

Alice Liu - 2D Concept Art

Isabelle Avena - 3D Character Modeler
